directions: In a food processor or blender purée the eggs with the Roquefort, the lemon juice, the yogurt, and salt and pepper to taste, transfer the mixture to a bowl, and stir in the scallions. Serve the dip with the potato chips or crudités.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
potato chips or crudités as an accompaniment
title: Hard-Boiled Egg, Roquefort, and Scallion Dip
